name: Meowgical Tower
description:
While out adventuring one day, intrepid adventurer Catte is driven toward a mysterious tower. Explore the tower to uncover its secrets!

Created for GameBoy Jam 3, yay!

Controls:

X: Inspect/Advance Text
Z: Attack/Meow
SPACE: Start Game/Paws
Hold LEFT SHIFT and press SPACE during play to reset to title.
